channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: DORA
channel.desc: Dora babysits Baby Flowers to help Isa in 'Adventures In Plantsitting', then in 'Andrea the Alebrije', Dora helps Andrea the Alebrije find her magical leaf. (S2, ep 8).

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: The Real Pup Squad
channel.desc: We meet Elana and Meeka, a mixed-breed dog, as they join The Real Pup Squad! There's a big mess in the garden - plastic bottles, cardboard boxes, and all sorts of rubbish everywhere.

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: Peppa Pig
channel.desc: Movie Night: Peppa and friends are at Penny Polar Bear's house for a movie night. But before they can watch it, the children need to decide where to sit, and which popcorn to eat. (S7, ep 18).

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: Peppa Pig
channel.desc: Art House Day: Granny Sheep and Suzy take Granny Pig and Peppa around Art House Day. After a day full of screen printing and silhouette miniatures, Granny Pig finds the perfect artwork. (S7, ep 19).

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: Peppa Pig
channel.desc: Sunny Day Games: Peppa and George are playing at their grandparent's garden on a very hot day but they don't have a paddling pool! (S7, ep 21).

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: Peppa Pig
channel.desc: Magic Trick; Jumping Stick: Two episodes.

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: Peppa Pig
channel.desc: Racquet Games; Adventure Caravan: Two episodes.

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: Ben & Holly's Little Kingdom
channel.desc: Redbeard's Rainbow: Rainbows are a pirate's best friend - if you're looking for a pot of gold. But, if like Captain Squid you are hiding treasure, then rainbows are a pirate's worst enemy.

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: Ben & Holly's Little Kingdom
channel.desc: Trip To The Seaside: Holly joins Ben and his family on a trip to the seaside, and Mr Elf tells her that no magic is to be used. But when no one has remembered to pack lunch, they ask Holly to help.

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: Ben & Holly's Little Kingdom
channel.desc: Visiting The Marigolds: Everyone is visiting snooty King and Queen Marigold's Castle. King and Queen Marigold give them a tour, which is not without a few mishaps.

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: Ben & Holly's Little Kingdom
channel.desc: Fox Cubs: There is a new fox cub leader in The Little Kingdom - Nanny Plum. But whilst trying to earn their adventure badges the fox cubs find themselves stuck at the top of a mountain.

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: Peppa Pig
channel.desc: Caravan Friends; Chloe's Birthday Party: Two episodes.

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: Peppa Pig
channel.desc: Broken Party Bus; Living Above the Shops: Two episodes.

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: Peppa Pig
channel.desc: Roof Top Garden; Moving In: Two episodes.

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: Peppa Pig
channel.desc: Everybody Sleepover!; Walking Bus: Two episodes.

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: Thomas & Friends
channel.desc: Overcommitted: When Thomas promises to spend time with both Nia and Kana he tries to be in two places at once, which proves to be impossible. (S27, ep 4).

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: Thomas & Friends
channel.desc: Sandy's Fine Mess: Sandy doesn't want to get rid of her treasure trove of junk, but with the help of Whiff, Henelope, and a runaway stop sign, she finds a new use for her belongings. (S27, ep 5).

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: Kangaroo Beach
channel.desc: Robo Dotty: Neville introduces a Robo-Dummy, but it goes rogue enforcing extreme rules. (S3, ep 3).

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: Kangaroo Beach
channel.desc: Charlene's Dream: A submarine overnight stay turns into an adventure when they encounter Charlene sleep-swimming. (S3, ep 6).

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: Super Duper Bunny League
channel.desc: We find out how it all started in 'Super Duper Bunnies!', then in 'Ye Olde Sourbreath!', the evil Lord Sourman and his dragon go on a rampage, so the bunnies must dish out sweet justice. (S1, ep 13).

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: The Smurfs
channel.desc: Dimwitty and Clumsy get rid of the fire truck in 'Fire Brigade on Foot', then in 'The Prettiest Pebble in the World', Gargamel leaves magic pebbles in the forest to hypnotize the Smurfs. (S4, ep 2).

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: DORA
channel.desc: Dora helps Swiper find his duplicates for a picnic in 'Too Many Swipers', and in 'Bateo's Home Run', Dora helps Bateo get to the baseball game. (S2, ep 10).

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: PAW Patrol
channel.desc: Mayor Humdinger decides to make the world's biggest omelette in 'Pups Save a Hatchling', then in 'Pups Save a Wrongway Farmhand', Traveling Travis volunteers to watch the farm. (S9, ep 8).

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: PAW Patrol
channel.desc: The pups are on a mission to save elephants in 'Pups Save Thundermouth', then in 'Pups Save a Class Pet', when the school hamster escapes, it's up to the Paw Patrol to save the pet. (S7, ep 26).

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: The Creature Cases
channel.desc: No one's food is safe in 'The Forest Food Bandit', then in 'The Case of the Absent Giraffe', Sam and Kit are on the case when Gordy the giraffe goes missing. (S1, ep 13).

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: The Creature Cases
channel.desc: Kit's on the case when a prairie dog is stung in 'The Case of the Scorpion's Sting', then in 'The Case of the Constant Dripping', something's making a noise that is bothering some birds. (S1, ep 19).

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: Gabby's Dollhouse
channel.desc: Kitty Fairy Gets Sick: When Kitty Fairy gets sick, Gabby, Pandy and the others get her to the garden. (S1, ep 25).

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: Ben & Holly's Little Kingdom
channel.desc: Spies: Nanny Plum and the Wise Old Elf compete to build a boat that will beat the Marigolds.

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: Ben & Holly's Little Kingdom
channel.desc: Hard Times: Unable to pay the elves, King Thistle has to go to work to earn a coin.

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: Peppa Pig
channel.desc: Looking for Things; Woodland Club: Two episodes.

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: Peppa Pig
channel.desc: Recorders; Playing Golf: Two episodes.

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: Peppa Pig
channel.desc: Bird Spotting; Tractor: Two episodes.

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: PAW Patrol
channel.desc: The postman's truck gets stuck in the mud, and the mail gets stuck in a tree in 'Pups Save the Mail', then in 'Pups Save a Frog Mayor', Mayor Goodway turns into a frog.

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: Peppa Pig
channel.desc: Racquet Games: Miss Rabbit gives Peppa and friends a tennis lesson, but the tennis balls get everywhere! So, the children play badminton instead and it's a lot easier. (S7, ep 24).

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: Peppa Pig
channel.desc: Caravan Friends: After Peppa and family visit a tourist spot with her new friend Birgit Bear, the caravan unhooks from the car! Luckily, the bear family stop it just in time. (S7, ep 26).

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: Peppa Pig
channel.desc: Chloe's Birthday Party; Broken Party Bus: Two episodes.

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: Peppa Pig
channel.desc: Moving In: Peppa is playing with Candy Cat when Emily Elephant's Granny moves out of the apartment. When the new neighbours arrive, Peppa recognises her holiday friend Rohan Rhino. (S7, ep 32).

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: Peppa Pig
channel.desc: Living Above the Shops: Peppa is playing with Freddy Fox at his home, in an apartment above the shops. Peggi and Pandora Panda, and Candy Cat live there too, and help show Peppa around. (S7, ep 30).

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: Peppa Pig
channel.desc: Everybody Sleepover!; Walking Bus: Two episodes.

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: Peppa Pig
channel.desc: Happily Ever After; Singing Lesson: Two episodes.

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: Peppa Pig
channel.desc: Singing Competition: Today is the grown-ups' singing competition at the theatre and the kids are the judges. The children jump up and down and sing along. Everybody loves singing! (S7, ep 37).

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: Peppa Pig
channel.desc: Roof Top Garden: Peppa and family come to help make a garden on the roof of the apartments. Mr Bull assists with a big truck and crane. There is even a little something for Mrs Duck! (S7, ep 31).

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: Ben & Holly's Little Kingdom
channel.desc: No Magic Day: For an entire day the Kingdom has to make do without help from magic.

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: Ben & Holly's Little Kingdom
channel.desc: The Wand Factory: Holly breaks her wand and must go to the Wand Factory, at the bottom of the Great Elf Tree, to get it fixed.

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: Ben & Holly's Little Kingdom
channel.desc: Queen Holly: Holly is left in charge when King and Queen Thistle go away on important business, but ruling the Little Kingdom isn't as easy as it looks.

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: Ben & Holly's Little Kingdom
channel.desc: Mrs Fig's Magic School: Despite protests from the Wise Old Elf, Ben accompanies Holly to her first day at magic school.

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: Peppa Pig
channel.desc: The Outback: The Pig family visit the Kangaroo family in Australia! On their first day they fly into the outback in Mr Kangaroo's aeroplane, have a barbeque and play some cricket with a Koala.

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: Peppa Pig
channel.desc: Surfing: On their second day in Australia the Kangaroo family take the Pig family to the beach where they try out surfing. George shows off his skills when he's out paddling with Daddy Pig.

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: Peppa Pig
channel.desc: The Great Barrier Reef: Today the family go to work with Mrs Kangaroo on the Great Barrier Reef. While taking in the beautiful views in Mrs Kangaroo's submarine, they find some special treasure.

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: Peppa Pig
channel.desc: The Boomerang: The holiday is coming to an end but there's still time to play with a Boomerang and make friends with Mr Wallaby. They all have trouble keeping the boomerang under control, though.

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: Peppa Pig
channel.desc: Sunny Day Games; Magic Trick: Two episodes.

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: Peppa Pig
channel.desc: Jumping Stick; Racquet Games; Adventure Caravan; Caravan Friends; Chloe's Birthday Party; Broken Party Bus: Six episodes.

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: The Adventures of Paddington
channel.desc: Paddington builds a robot in 'Paddington Meets PaddingTron', then in 'Paddington's First Diwali', Baaz invites everyone to celebrate Diwali with him and Paddington is his helpful assistant. (S3, ep 5).

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: The Adventures of Paddington
channel.desc: Paddington has a race against time in 'Paddington and the Solar Eclipse', then in 'Paddington and the Mysterious Inventor', Simi receives an inventor's award, but why does she feel sad? (S3, ep 6).

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: The Adventures of Paddington
channel.desc: The Browns go to the beach in 'Paddington's Summer Holiday Begins', then in 'Paddington's Life Guard Training', Paddington, Jonathan and Judy rescue Mr Brown with lifeguard Taylor's help. (S3, ep 7).

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: The Adventures of Paddington
channel.desc: Something is making strange noises in 'Paddington's Mysterious Cave Discovery', and in 'Paddington and the Fossil Hunt', Judy wants to find a fossil on the beach, but isn't having any luck. (S3, ep 8).

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: Peppa Pig
channel.desc: Granny Sheep Moves In; Cardboard Boxes; Clubhouse Takeaway; Walkie Talkies; Peppa's Office; Little Swift; What Babies Do; Lenses: Eight episodes.

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: Paw Patrol
channel.desc: Pups Save the Butterflies: Chickaletta is stuck on a runaway drone and mysterious butterflies are causing chaos all around Adventure Bay.

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: Paw Patrol
channel.desc: Pups Save an Underground Chicken: The statue of Chickaletta has been stolen by Mayor Humdinger and is making its way through Adventure Bay's underground tunnel system.

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: The Adventures of Paddington
channel.desc: Paddington helps Mateo dress up in 'Paddington and the Three Musketeers', then in 'Paddington and the Dinosaur Hunt', Paddington, Simi and Jonathan are on a dinosaur hunt in the park. (S3, ep 3).

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: The Adventures of Paddington
channel.desc: Things go missing in Windsor Gardens in 'Paddington's Journey into a Black Hole', then in 'Paddington's Rainbow Race!', Simi and Paddington try to find the gold at the end of rainbow. (S3, ep 4).

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: Peppa Pig
channel.desc: Adventure Caravan; Caravan Friends: Two episodes.

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: Peppa Pig
channel.desc: Chloe's Birthday Party; Broken Party Bus: Two episodes.

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: Brave Bunnies
channel.desc: Tricks and Treats: It's autumn on the Plains, as Bop and Boo get ready to celebrate Pumpkin Night. They bump into their RACCOON pal, Ricky, dressed as the spooky Spider King.

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: Brave Bunnies
channel.desc: An Interesting Hunt: Bop and the bunnies' adventurous tiger BBF, Garry, compete in a nature hunt, eager to find the coolest thing ever, but Boo comes up the biggest surprise.

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: Brave Bunnies
channel.desc: What Now?: In the snowy forest, the Brave Bunnies find the road blocked by a drift. While Ma and Pa clear the way, Bop and Boo make a big snowball with their moose friend, Dwayne. (S1, ep 37).

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: DORA
channel.desc: Dora helps the Grumples make 'Troll Jelly', and then in 'Catch That Kitty', Dora recovers the artifact El Gatito Magico. (S2, ep 7).

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: DORA
channel.desc: Dora, Boots, and Benny trek through the rainforest to deliver a cake in 'Tres Leches Trouble', then in 'Wizzle Wozzle Woo', Dora and the Fiesta Trio investigate a loud, strange noise. (S1, ep 9).

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: Kangaroo Beach
channel.desc: The Curse of Boomerang Island: A leisure sailing trip turns dangerous when a boat gets stuck on a reef.

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: Kangaroo Beach
channel.desc: Little Trev's Turtle: Big Trev tells a childhood story while waiting for his old turtle friend, Salty.

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: Gabby's Dollhouse
channel.desc: DJ's Glow Ride: Gabby receives a glow-in-the-dark train, but its cars are missing. With help from DJ Catnip, the Gabby Cats build the remaining cars. (S1, ep 21).

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: DORA
channel.desc: Dora helps Tio Tesoro find his treasure trackers in 'Tio Tesoro's Treasure', then in 'The Great Key Mystery', Dora investigates the Great Key Mystery. (S2, ep 13).

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: The Smurfs
channel.desc: Chef walks out in a huff and ends up cooking for the Ogres in 'Chef Soup', and in 'Adventures in Smurfsitting', Clumsy and Dimwitty try to show Smurf Village how smurfsome they really are. (S1, ep 12).

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: Super Duper Bunny League
channel.desc: The team must defend the fans at the Important City ballpark in 'Lizard Lips!', then in 'Space Pirates!', a Space Pirate Captain who threatens to ruin the party plans for Derek's birthday. (S1, ep 1).

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: The Creature Cases
channel.desc: Mysterious lights are messing up the dancing at the firefly prom in 'The Unidentified Shiny Object', and in 'The Case of the Crying Monkey', the duo follows sounds to locate a baby monkey. (S1, ep 9).

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: DORA
channel.desc: Dora stops the Guava Geyser from erupting in 'The Floor Is Guava', then in 'We Are The Grumples', Dora travels to Troll World to find the Grumpy Old Troll (S2, ep 4).

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: The Real Pup Squad
channel.desc: We meet Isla and her Chihuahua, Gizmo, as they join The Real Pup Squad! Their mission? To find and rescue the lost penguins in the jungle and bring them back to safety.

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: Peppa Pig
channel.desc: Happily Ever After: At the playgroup, Madame Gazelle is reading a story, but a page is missing so she makes up an ending. During playtime, the children make up their own endings too! (S7, ep 35).

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: Peppa Pig
channel.desc: Singing Lesson: Madame Gazelle is giving the playgroup a singing lesson, helped by Mummy Rhino on the piano. When the parents arrive, the children perform their song. (S7, ep 36).

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: Peppa Pig
channel.desc: Larenzo Lion: Today, Mummy Pig and Peppa are at the zoo and meet Larenzo Lion who lives there! Larenzo shows Peppa his toy zoo, but he keeps misplacing his wooden animals in his two bedrooms.

channel.title: Peppa Pig
channel.desc: Dinosaurs Alive!; Being Babies: Two episodes.

channel.desc: Mr Cat's Cafe; Cushion Den: Two episodes.

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: Ben & Holly's Little Kingdom
channel.desc: Ben's Birthday Card: Holly forgets Ben's birthday, and rushes home to make him a birthday card. But Nanny has stopped all magic, so Holly has to make the card herself.

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: Ben & Holly's Little Kingdom
channel.desc: The Party: It's the twins' birthday party and chaos ensues when their little friends arrive. The Wise Old Elf tries to entertain them, but they turn him into a mouse.

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: Ben & Holly's Little Kingdom
channel.desc: Gaston is Lost: Ben and Holly want to play with Gaston the ladybird but he is missing. Nanny Plum uses her magic crystal ball to find him, and discover his daily routine is not what they thought.

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: Ben & Holly's Little Kingdom
channel.desc: Books: Queen Thistle reads the children a story, which inspires a question. They can't find the answer in the magic books in the castle, so go instead to the Wise Old Elf in the Great Elf Library.

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: Peppa Pig
channel.desc: Staying Up Late; New TV: Two episodes.

channel.title: Peppa Pig

channel.desc: Folk Music Band; Calling Kylie: Two episodes.

channel.title: Peppa Pig
channel.desc: House Rules; Big Announcement: Two episodes.

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: Ben & Holly's Little Kingdom
channel.desc: Gaston The Ladybird: Holly and Ben think Gaston the Ladybird is sad so they try and cheer him up by tidying his cave. But Gaston liked his cave just as it was - all messy and untidy.

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: Ben & Holly's Little Kingdom
channel.desc: Redbeard The Elf Pirate: Barnaby Elf's uncle, Redbeard the Elf Pirate, comes to visit the Little Kingdom, but he has lost his treasure. Everyone must help Redbeard track down the treasure.

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: Ben & Holly's Little Kingdom
channel.desc: Baby Dragon: The children have adopted a new pet - a dragon named Dave.

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: Ben & Holly's Little Kingdom
channel.desc: The Elf Farm: Holly goes with Ben and Mr Elf to the elf farm to collect an egg for the King's breakfast. While there, a huge chicken escapes from the farm and Holly and the elves have to chase it.

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: Peppa Pig
channel.desc: Danny's Pirate Bedroom; Weather Station: Two episodes.

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: Peppa Pig

channel.desc: Families; The Owl: Two episodes.

channel.name: Nick Jr UK

channel.desc: Gaston Goes to the Vet: Ben Elf and his parents are going on holiday in the elf truck but Gaston the Ladybird has swallowed the car keys.

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: Ben & Holly's Little Kingdom
channel.desc: Dolly Plum: Ben, Holly and Gaston the Ladybird find a large egg in the meadow.

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: Rubble & Crew
channel.desc: The Crew helps Charger fall asleep in 'The Crew Builds Charger a Super Bed', then in 'The Crew Builds a Super Squirrely Whirly Playground', the pups play like Super Squirrely Whirly. (S2, ep 7).

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: The Creature Cases
channel.desc: Someone's snatching all the fruit in 'The Mysterious Fruit Thief', then in 'The Riddle of the Wrestling Lizards', the agents try to bring some peace to a pair of brawling gila monsters. (S1, ep 5).

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: DORA
channel.desc: Isa's throwing a party where everyone will be dancing in 'The Rainforest Ritmo', then in 'The Magic Nut', Dora leads everyone into the Tricky Trappy Forest to recover Tico's magic nut. (S1, ep 7).

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: Gabby's Dollhouse
channel.desc: Googly Eyes: Gabby receives a jar of googly eyes that comes with a warning: \"Don't shake the jar of googly eyes or you'll be in for a troublemaking surprise.\" (S3, ep 9).

channel.desc: The Panda Twins; Lots of Muddy Puddles: Two episodes.

channel.desc: Gaston Goes To School: Naughty Gaston is sent to pet school, where Miss Jolly soon gets him into shape.

channel.desc: Elf Rescue: With so many rescue missions, Elf Rescue needs a helping hand from Children Rescue.

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: PAW Patrol
channel.desc: Ryder and the pups need to unplug Old Trusty the geyser in 'Pups Save Old Trusty', then in 'Pups Save a Pony', Priscilla the pony gets the chance to help the Paw Patrol rescue their own vehicle.

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: Peppa Pig
channel.desc: Adventure Caravan: Peppa and her family are on a caravan adventure and the first stop is The Biggest Potato in the World. When it starts to get foggy, they park up before another busy day. (S7, ep 25).

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: Peppa Pig
channel.desc: Larenzo Lion: Today, Mummy Pig and Peppa are at the zoo and meet Larenzo Lion who lives there! Larenzo shows Peppa his toy zoo, but he keeps misplacing his wooden animals in his two bedrooms.

channel.title: Peppa Pig
channel.desc: Dinosaurs Alive!; Being Babies: Two episodes.

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: Peppa Pig
channel.desc: Staying Up Late: Auntie, Uncle Pig and cousin Chloe are coming for dinner and Peppa is allowed to join too! Peppa is very proud of staying up late - she even stayed up later than the Daddies.

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: Peppa Pig
channel.desc: Mr Cat's Cafe: Peppa is on a play date with Candy Cat at Mr Cat's Cafe. Candy show Mr Cat the drawings they've done of everyone, and he hangs them up for everyone to see.

channel.title: Peppa Pig
channel.desc: New TV; Indoor Adventure: Two episodes.

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: Peppa Pig
channel.desc: Hot Dry Day; Folk Music Band: Two episodes.

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: Peppa Pig
channel.desc: Calling Kylie: It is bedtime and Peppa calls Kylie Kangaroo and is surprised to learn it's not morning or winter where she is! Daddy Pig explains this using a big ball to represent the earth.

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: Peppa Pig
channel.desc: Cushion Den: On a cold day, Daddy Pig suggests they build a den until Mummy Pig has finished work. After a hard day's work, the cushion den is a perfect place to watch TV together.

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: Ben & Holly's Little Kingdom
channel.desc: The Tooth Fairy: Ben and Holly are excited when they learn that Nanny Plum is a Tooth Fairy at night, and go along with her to pick up a little girl's tooth. But the little girl is not so little.

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: Ben & Holly's Little Kingdom
channel.desc: Miss Jolly's Riding Club: Ben, Holly and their friends go on a snail trek with Miss Jolly.

channel.title: Ben & Holly's Little Kingdom
channel.desc: Spies: Nanny Plum and the Wise Old Elf compete to build a boat that will beat the Marigolds.

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: Ben & Holly's Little Kingdom
channel.desc: Big Ben & Holly: When a spell accidentally goes wrong, Ben and Holly grow to human size! Now they can play with Lucy and her friends, and want to stay big forever.

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: Peppa Pig
channel.desc: Nursery Rhymes: Madame Gazelle and the playgroup are sharing their best nursery rhymes with each other.

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: Peppa Pig
channel.desc: Digger World: Mummy and Daddy Pig, Peppa and George have a wonderful day with Mr. Potato at Digger World.

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: Peppa Pig
channel.desc: The Doll Hospital: When Peppa gets Teddy dirty jumping in muddy puddles, she goes to The Doll Hospital.

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: Peppa Pig
channel.desc: Wendy Wolf's Birthday: Wendy Wolf's birthday is here and she has invited Peppa and friends around for a party.

channel.desc: Paddington learns that seagulls love chips in 'Paddington vs the Seagulls', and in 'Paddington and the Light House', the lighthouse light is broken - can Paddington help save a boat at sea? (S3, ep 9).

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: The Adventures of Paddington
channel.desc: Paddington seeks Captain Green Beard's loot in 'Paddington's Pirate Treasure Hunt', then in 'Paddington's Sandcastle Showstopper', everyone is keen to win the sandcastle competition! (S3, ep 10).

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: The Adventures of Paddington
channel.desc: Some pufflings get lost in 'Paddington's Puffling Rescue', then in 'Paddington Goes Under The Sea', Paddington enjoys a diving adventure with Jonathan and Judy - but where is her necklace? (S3, ep 11).

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: The Adventures of Paddington
channel.desc: The beach is a mess until 'Paddington's Beach Clean Up', then in 'Paddington's Holiday Farewell', the summer holidays have come to an end, so it's time to say goodbye to their new friends. (S3, ep 12).

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: Peppa Pig
channel.desc: Igloo; Mr Bull is Getting Married; Getting Ready for a Wedding; Wedding Day; Party Bus; Movie Night; Art House Day; Wildflower Wood: Eight episodes.

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: Paw Patrol
channel.desc: Pups Save a Duck Pond: When water in the duck pond mysteriously drains out, it's up to the Paw Patrol to find out what's happening.

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: Paw Patrol
channel.desc: Pups Save the Kitty Rescue Crew: Mayor Humdinger makes fake emergencies for his kitties to save so they appear better than the Paw Patrol.

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: The Adventures of Paddington
channel.desc: Paddington builds a robot in 'Paddington Meets PaddingTron', then in 'Paddington's First Diwali', Baaz invites everyone to celebrate Diwali with him and Paddington is his helpful assistant. (S3, ep 5).

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: The Adventures of Paddington
channel.desc: Paddington has a race against time in 'Paddington and the Solar Eclipse', then in 'Paddington and the Mysterious Inventor', Simi receives an inventor's award, but why does she feel sad? (S3, ep 6).

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: Peppa Pig
channel.desc: Living Above the Shops; Roof Top Garden: Two episodes.

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: Peppa Pig
channel.desc: Moving In; Everybody Sleepover!: Two episodes.

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: Brave Bunnies
channel.desc: Rain Race: Bop and Boo revisit the mountains and their llama friend Lara in Rain Race. They arrive at her cactus garden to find Lara in a panic. (S1, ep 46).

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: Brave Bunnies
channel.desc: Bubble Trouble: The Brave Bunnies stop in the plains so Pa and Ma can wash the bus. Bop and Boo grab bubble kits and set off to play. They meet a mouse and invite her to join the fun. (S1, ep 38).

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: Brave Bunnies
channel.desc: Night Visitor: One evening on the Plains, Bop and Boo meet Batty, a friendly, flying bat. (S1, ep 40).

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: DORA
channel.desc: Dora helps Boots win the Rainforest Race in 'Rainforest Race', then in 'Bok Bok Birthday', Dora invites friends to Big Red Chicken's birthday party. (S2, ep 9).

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: DORA
channel.desc: Big Red Chicken's magic makes everything wacky in 'Wonky Wishing Wand', then in 'Bip Bip's Big Show', Dora gets Bip Bip to his concert with Tico. (S1, ep 11).

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: Kangaroo Beach
channel.desc: The Everything Day: Pounce tries to fit everything into one day with his dad but forgets safety.

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: Kangaroo Beach
channel.desc: Big Baby Cadet Challenge: Reef and Roadie hilariously disguise themselves as babies to win an obstacle course. (S3, ep 6).

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: Gabby's Dollhouse
channel.desc: Cupcake Tree: When the Gabby Cats get stuck in the leaves of an overgrown cupcake tree, it's up to Gabby, Pandy and cupcake-expert Cakey to work together to save CatRat. (S2, ep 12).

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: DORA
channel.desc: Dora helps a Unicornasaurus get a magic paintbrush back in 'Unicornasaurus', then in 'The Grumple Games', Dora helps Hearty win the Grumple Games. (S3, ep 2).

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: The Smurfs
channel.desc: When Smurfette rescues Brainy from a snake, the others ask her to teach them \"Smurf-Fu', then in 'Diaper Daddy', everyone is tired of changing Baby's diapers, Handy invents a robot to help.

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: Super Duper Bunny League
channel.desc: The team must put pause their summer plans in 'Auntie Freeze!', then in 'Goin' Camping!', Annabelle takes the team camping without their powers, and must save the day when things go wrong. (S1, ep 2).

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: The Creature Cases
channel.desc: There's a game of hide-and-seek in the wetlands in 'The Lost Capybara Kids', then in 'The Case of the Curious Keas', Sam and Kit try to figure out who's playing tricks on them in the snow. (S1, ep 17).

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: DORA
channel.desc: Dora helps Swiper find his duplicates for a picnic in 'Too Many Swipers', and in 'Bateo's Home Run', Dora helps Bateo get to the baseball game. (S2, ep 10).

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: The Real Pup Squad
channel.desc: We meet Lexi, Levi, and Will, a friendly German Shepherd, as they embark on a rescue mission to find a lost bag of dog treats hidden somewhere in the garden.

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: Peppa Pig
channel.desc: Miss Rabbit's Relaxation Class: Miss Rabbit persuades Mummy Pig to go to her relaxation class, but relaxing proves more difficult than expected.

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: Peppa Pig
channel.desc: Parking Ticket: When Daddy Pig gets a parking ticket, Peppa and George learn that grown-ups have rules just like children - and get told off too.

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: Peppa Pig
channel.desc: Buttercups, Daisies and Dandelions: During a picnic in her garden, cousin Chloe shows Peppa and George fun things to do with wild flowers.

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: Peppa Pig
channel.desc: The Marble Run; Grandpa Pig's Metal Detector: Two episodes.

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: Peppa Pig
channel.desc: World Book Day; Children's Festival: Two episodes.

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: Ben & Holly's Little Kingdom
channel.desc: Nanny's Magic Test: Nanny's magic licence is out of date and in order to get a new one she must pass a test, set by the Wise Old Elf.

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: Ben & Holly's Little Kingdom
channel.desc: Chickens Ride West: King Thistle wants a boiled egg for his breakfast, so the elves decide to deliver the King the chickens from the Elf Farm so he can have an egg whenever he likes.

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: Ben & Holly's Little Kingdom
channel.desc: The Mermaid: Lucy and her dad are having a relaxing day boating on the lake. They fish out an old glittery mirror from the bottom of the lake, but it belongs to a mermaid who would like it back.

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: Ben & Holly's Little Kingdom
channel.desc: Daisy and Poppy's Trip to the Museum: The naughty toddlers cause chaos again. Mrs Fotheringill gets zapped back to the stone-age, and Nanny Plum turns everyone into frogs.

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: Peppa Pig
channel.desc: Muddy Festival; Strawberries: Two episodes.

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: Peppa Pig
channel.desc: Grandpa Pig's Birthday; The Petting Farm: Two episodes.

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: Peppa Pig
channel.desc: Pizza! Pizza!; TV Land: Two episodes.

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: Peppa Pig
channel.desc: Roman Day; Bird Spotting: Two episodes.

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: Ben & Holly's Little Kingdom
channel.desc: Daisy and Poppy: Holly and her friends must stay in the courtyard and play with Holly's little twin sisters Daisy and Poppy. All is fine until the twins borrow a magic wand and escape from the castle.

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: Ben & Holly's Little Kingdom
channel.desc: Tadpoles: Holly takes some frogspawn home from class to look after, but is surprised when the frogspawn turns into tadpoles overnight. Soon there are lots of little frogs for Holly to look after.

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: Ben & Holly's Little Kingdom
channel.desc: The Lost City: Redbeard the Elf Pirate sets sail to find the lost city, but soon finds himself in trouble and in need of rescuing.

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: Ben & Holly's Little Kingdom
channel.desc: Queen Thistle's Teapot: Queen Thistle has a beautiful new teapot so delicate that no one is allowed to touch it. Holly accidentally breaks the teapot and tries to fix it with Ben's help.

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: Peppa Pig
channel.desc: The Apple Tree; The Big Hill: Two episodes.

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: Peppa Pig
channel.desc: Hippies; Bug Hotel: Two episodes.

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: Peppa Pig
channel.desc: Parachute Games; Flying Discs: Two episodes.

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: Peppa Pig
channel.desc: Kiddie Workout; Little Cars: Two episodes.

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: Ben & Holly's Little Kingdom
channel.desc: Queen Thistle's Day Off: Queen Thistle decides to take a day off, so Holly, Ben, Nanny and the King have to look after the naughty twins Daisy and Poppy for the day.

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: Ben & Holly's Little Kingdom
channel.desc: The Shooting Star: The Wise Old Elf fears an alien invasion after a presumed shooting star lands in the Little Kingdom.

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: Rubble & Crew
channel.desc: The pups build a train station on the farm in 'The Crew Builds a Train Station', then in 'The Crew Builds a Sierra Sparkle Sign', the pups fix Speed Meister's sign. (S2, ep 2).

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: The Creature Cases
channel.desc: A silver ant is swept up by a sandstorm in 'The Search for the Silver Ant Hill', then in 'The Search for the Swamp Snapper', Sam and Kit visit the swamp to investigate a dinosaur sighting. (S1, ep 10).

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: DORA
channel.desc: Dora gets baby crocs to sleep in 'Croc-A-Bye Baby', The Troll appears in 'Wanna Empanada?', Boots tries new boots in 'if The Boot Fits', and the twins have problems with a 'Pinata Party'. (S1, ep 10).

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: Gabby's Dollhouse
channel.desc: The Magical Mermaid-lantis: It's the big Mermaid Sparkle Party in Mermaid-lantis! But when the grumpy Kitty Squiddy tries to ruin the party for everyone, Gabby and Pandy must save the day. (S3, ep 13).

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: Peppa Pig
channel.desc: Super Potato Movie; Bat and Ball: Two episodes.

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: Peppa Pig
channel.desc: Buried Treasure; The Perfect Day: Two episodes.

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: Ben & Holly's Little Kingdom
channel.desc: The Lost City: Redbeard the Elf Pirate sets sail to find the lost city, but soon finds himself in trouble and in need of rescuing.

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: Ben & Holly's Little Kingdom
channel.desc: The Shooting Star: The Wise Old Elf fears an alien invasion after a presumed shooting star lands in the Little Kingdom.

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: Ben & Holly's Little Kingdom
channel.desc: Gaston To The Rescue: Out looking for Gaston, after banning him from the castle, the elves and fairies come across a speaking door which leads to the dwarf mine. Once in, they find they can't get out.

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: Ben & Holly's Little Kingdom
channel.desc: Miss Cookie's Nature Trail: Miss Cookie's class is out on a nature trail, in the Little Kingdom! It is up to Ben and Holly to prevent the elves and fairies being discovered.

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: The Tiny Chef Show
channel.desc: Chef & Olly make a cake for Olly's Dino Club in 'Dino Cake', then in 'Dumplings', Chef shows Olly how to make dumplings. (S2, ep 9).

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: PAW Patrol
channel.desc: Fertilizer causes Farmer Yumi's crops to sprout huge veggies in 'Pups Get Growing', and then in 'Pups Save a Space Toy', the Paw Patrol draws a message to space aliens on Farmer Al's field.

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: Peppa Pig
channel.desc: House Rules: While visiting Suzy and Emily's house, Peppa is surprised there are extra rules she doesn't have in her own house like no shoes indoors and no eating peanuts.

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: Peppa Pig
channel.desc: Big Announcement: Today is a special day because Mummy and Daddy Pig have big news to tell Peppa and George. However, Peppa and George struggle to wait patiently, so resort to playing games.

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: Peppa Pig
channel.desc: Grandpa's Robot; Paper Games: Two episodes.

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: Peppa Pig
channel.desc: Granny Sheep Moves In: Peppa is playing at Suzy's house and they find out that Granny Sheep is moving in! She transforms the dull spare room and attic into an exotic boudoir and creative studio.

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: Peppa Pig
channel.desc: Clouds: Mummy, Daddy, Peppa and George are going to the seaside. Mummy and Daddy explain clouds to Peppa and George who have a little sing and dance about clouds.

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: Peppa Pig
channel.desc: Cardboard Boxes; Clubhouse Takeaway: Two episodes.

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: Peppa Pig
channel.desc: Walkie Talkies; Peppa's Office: Two episodes.

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: Peppa Pig
channel.desc: Little Swift: Peppa and her family take a poorly swift to the vet's. After a night of rest, the swift recovers and Doctor Hamster releases it so it can fly around the world again.

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: Peppa Pig
channel.desc: Mr. Bull Digs Up The River: Grandpa Pig is taking Peppa and George for a day on his boat. They see Mr. Bull, who's using his digger boat to remove all the rubbish in the river that shouldn't be there.

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: Ben & Holly's Little Kingdom
channel.desc: The Elf Band: Snobby King and Queen Marigold are coming to visit the Little Kingdom, and Holly and her Mummy and Daddy enlist the Elf Band to impress them.

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: Ben & Holly's Little Kingdom
channel.desc: Hard Times: Unable to pay the elves, King Thistle has to go to work to earn a coin.

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: Ben & Holly's Little Kingdom
channel.desc: Holly's Magic Wand: Holly needs her wand to do magic. But one day Holly loses her wand and is very sad. Ben uses his elf skills to find it again.
